caption: Has become my go-to place for Chinese food! Love the wonton soup and the chicken entrees I get are always tender and flavorful. Generous portion size too!

I came here a lot before the makeover. I always ordered the same thing. Since the makeover I have been ordering mostly from the phone. Today I had time to actually walk in to place a order. When I walked in the lady was playing on her phone. I kindly waited for her to notice me. She didn’t the chef in the back had to tell her to look up. I asked her for what I always ordered and she actually yelled at me saying “we don’t make that where is that on the menu?” I kindly told her I ordered that all of the time. She doubled the price. (I honestly didn’t say anything because I was tired) when my order was ready her nose was running and she was trying to hold the snot with her forearm for a while before getting tissue. 🤦🏾‍♀️when I got home, I realized that not only was she rude, and sloppy  but actually got my order wrong. Never ever ever again will I be going here. This is the first time I ever had issues here btw. Front desk cashier should be fired.

The good: I love how clean and polished everything is at this new Chinese restaurant. They have a wide variety of options. Their healthy menu is awesome! I I like their noodles and fried dishes too. I really like their delivery speed and the fact that they don’t send you to a website to make an order for delivery  The bad: The big drawback for me is that their Chicken and broccoli  is swimming in chunky brown sauce and the chicken itself is a little too chewy.

This place is horribly i have brought some food  from them twice to make sure that it was not just a bad day the cook was having but i was correct the food  ( pepper steak combo first time ) then the second ( it was house special chicken and shrimp with brown rice).. Both times they fill your container with big chucks for vegetable. Then only 2 shrimps and the chicken seem old and chewy....The rice seem also old and taste bad..
i love this place because it has awsome food for an awsome price and very friendly staff i recmon it it
Excellent food, super nice staff members, constantly good ambience. They charge fair pricing and the food quality is good. Highly recommended.

The woman who took the order on the phone was rude. And the presentation of the food was sloppy; the garlic sauce to my order was all over the other items in the bag. Ordered a shrimp fried rice that came with only two shrimps. Not to mention the delivery guy doesn’t deliver to the door and must be met outside the apt building.
(Translated by Google) This is a comfortable, clean and delicious Chinese restaurant.  (Original) 这是一家舒适，干净又美味的中国餐馆。
A welcomed addition to the neighborhood. Quick, affordable, and great food. I will be returning!

The place is located in another former Chinese Restaurant. This new restaurant has undergone renovation and is quite nice. The food and service seems to be just as good as the previous restaurant. Try the Kung Pao Beef and General Tso's Chicken.
Great lunch deals, fast, love that you can watch the cooking. Great for midday pickup!
Great Chinese food, clean,  and open view  so you can see how they cook. First time going and plan to return.  Steamed Shrimp dumplings was good.
